summary: This is an email chain from November 10, 2025, discussing a UK Metropolitan Police inquiry named 'Operation Dawnchorus' regarding allegations against Prince Andrew and his activities with Jeffrey Epstein. The emails involve FBI personnel and a Met Police DCI seeking coordination and information about ongoing investigations and material from US Oversight Committee hearings.

persons.name: Ollie Stride
persons.context: A DCI in the Met Police's Complex Case & Exploitation Command who is reviewing allegations against Prince Andrew and reaches out to FBI contacts for information and coordination regarding Epstein/Maxwell cases and Oversight Committee material.

persons.name: Tariq Farooqi
persons.context: A DCI who previously worked with the FBI recipients in 2021 on cases against Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, and provided the contact details for this inquiry.

persons.name: Mandy Young
persons.role: FBI Special Agent (original NY Epstein case agent)
persons.context: Described as the original NY Epstein case agent, now located in BA (possibly Bureau Administration or a different office). Her role is mentioned in the context of who currently handles the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as the subject of past cases and investigations, with mention of his flight manifests to the UK and trafficking allegations.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Epstein in relation to cases worked on by DCI Tariq Farooqi and the FBI in 2021.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Described as a (former) Prince, with UK media reporting on his activities with an unnamed female and alleged efforts to get information about her through his protection officers, in connection to Epstein.

connections.description: Colleagues within the Metropolitan Police; Stride was given the FBI contact details by Farooqi.
Previously worked together in 2021 on cases against Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The email references media reporting about Prince Andrew's activities 'with' Epstein and flight manifests from when Epstein arrived in the UK with other passengers.
Stride is reaching out to FBI contacts to enquire about active investigations and coordinate regarding 'Operation Dawnchorus'.

events.title: Past Epstein/Maxwell Case Collaboration
events.description: DCI Tariq Farooqi of the Met Police did some work with the FBI recipients on the cases against Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Met Police Inquiry 'Operation Dawnchorus'
events.description: DCI Ollie Stride initiates contact with FBI personnel to review UK media allegations against Prince Andrew related to Epstein, seeking information on active investigations and Oversight Committee material.

locations: Jubilee House, 230 - 232 Putney Bridge Road, London SW15 2PD
New York, NY (implied by 'NY VCAC desk' and 'original NY Epstein case')
keyFacts: A UK Metropolitan Police operation named 'Operation Dawnchorus' is actively reviewing allegations against Prince Andrew related to Jeffrey Epstein as of November 2025.
UK media is reported to be in possession of material from the US Oversight Committee, including Epstein flight manifests detailing passengers on trips to the UK.
The allegations include that Prince Andrew made efforts to get information about an unnamed female through his protection officers.
The email chain shows ongoing inter-agency coordination between the UK Met Police and the FBI regarding Epstein-related investigations years after the main prosecutions.
The original FBI case agent for the NY Epstein investigation, Mandy Young, is noted as now being in 'BA' (likely a different office or role).
